name: L'amour rebelle - First Live Opera NFT Limited Collection

metadata.name: L’ amour est un oiseau rebelle
metadata.description:
This large charcoal drawing by Leo Crane is one of four concept artworks for L’amour rebelle, the first-ever live opera NFT. Here we see the Rebel Bird ("l'oiseau rebelle"), the personification of sexuality: fierce and wild - tame it at your peril!

L'amour rebelle explores sexuality and conflict by reimagining Georges Bizet’s classic opera Carmen. It premiered with a live performance and animated projections in Los Angeles on 29 March 2022. 

* Musical arrangement by Zachary Whitney, performed by Merav Eldan.  
* Drawings and animation by Leo Crane, featuring Roy Joseph Butler. 
* L’amour rebelle is a Figuration/Electrifying Opera co-production.
